name: Enigma (itch) (MIqbalKalevi)
description:
A 2D action-adventure platformer game with unique mechanics and beautiful artstyle.

Move through the air, fight amazing boss battles, and run through challanging levels using our unique physics-based movement system which utilizes orbs to push/pull the player!

Made for COMPFEST 12's Indie Game Ignite.

By SmolBrain Team:
  1. Muhammad Iqbal Kalevi
  2. Muhammad Hafiizul Kirom
